entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
